image:image.image:title: 2D Sidescroller Game
image:image.image:caption: First game project using the game engine Torque Game Builder. Also referred to Torque2D. This is a sidescrolling space shooter game and one of my most favourite projects that I've worked on.

image:image.image:title: Light Post

image:image.image:title: Hard Drive Racer
image:image.image:caption: This is a group project racing game using the game engine Torque3D. This is a racing game to avoid obstacles and get the fastest time and one of my most favourite projects that I've worked on.

image:image.image:title: Mastercook
image:image.image:caption: This is a website I helped to create to allow customers to store recipes online and access anywhere they have an internet connection and internet browser.

image:image.image:title: Projectbook
image:image.image:caption: This is a website I created to provide information about the iPad application called Projectbook. (This website and application are no longer active)

image:image.image:title: 3D Defend Game
image:image.image:caption: This is my first 3D game using the game engine Torque3D. The opbjective of the game is to protect the central location as a horde of enemies grew closer.
